This is a great game and works perfectly well both as a single player game or with friends.

The game offers immersive gameplay from a beginner to a more experienced player of the game:
In the start you don't pay that much attention to mechanics and advanced gameplay of the game including the numerous perks and suchs. You really just try to hide from the killer, which gives an incredible immersive experience and feels more like a horror game than a multiplayer game.

From there on you start paying more attention to the game as a competitive multiplayer game than just a horror game. This detail offers endless hours of fun. 

It has a great transition and learning curve and it is always funny to queue up with your friends and try your best to survive the merciless killer.
DRED
Fun

Após jogar cerca de 800h deste jogo maravilhoso, resolvi fazer uma análise. Eu:
-Recomendo este jogo para jogadores que desejam passar raiva, arrancar o cabo da internet e jogar o PC pela janela.
-Não recomendo este jogo para jogadores que desejam viver com paz e harmonia mental e corporal.

Игра на уровне "говно съело говно"
1. 18 дней не дают очков прокачки (бладпоинты). Правильно, зачем они вообще нужны кому-то?
2. При игре за сурвов тебе кидает игроков с одним наигранным часом в команду и профи за мана. А при игре за мана тебе кидает пати 1-х рангов с дискордом.
3. Токсичность зашкаливает. После одной катки за духа мне начали угрожать в лс и пытались агитировать других угрожать мне в твиттере. 
Этих трёх пунктов хватит что бы завершить жизнь суицидом после приседаний и щёлканий фонариком. 
10 кусков говна из 20. Думаю до 20 кусочков недалеко.

My Favourite game at the moment big fan of horror and if you are too you'll love this! fully immerse yourself into the role of a killer or a survivor!! all the great movie killers you know and love make this game so epic, being able to become them with different abilities unique to each character! and being the survivor from your fave horror adds to the fun of it all. with the games own unique characters you get to play as this game brings a lot to the player to enjoy! 9/10
